The Dungeon Master's Guide is an essential rulebook for Dungeon Masters of the Dungeons & Dragons role-playing game. It contains rules for character creation and advancement, backgrounds and skills, exploration and combat, equipment, spells, and much more. The fifth edition of this book was released in 2014.

Dungeons and Dragons (D&D) is a tabletop role-playing game that centers on the characters created by the players. A Dungeon Master (DM), or game master, is responsible for creating a setting for the story to take place in, as well as all of the challenges that the players will face during their journey.
The Dungeon Master’s Guide is one of the three core rulebooks for Dungeons and Dragons, a fantasy roleplaying game. The Dungeon Master’s Guide provides information on how to run a Dungeons and Dragons campaign, including how to design campaigns, how to play characters, and how to create monsters. It also includes information about magic items, languages, and spells among other things.
